component.name: Kanji Dojo
component.summary: Japanese language learning app with writing exercises, flashcards and built-in dictionary

description.p: Learn how to write Japanese letters, memorize their meanings and readings and study supplementary vocabulary

ul.li: Learn kana and kanji with writing exercises and flashcards
Follow JLPT levels or school grades
Create your own decks to study, more than 6000 characters in total are available
Use SRS reviewing system to avoid forgetting learned information
Search letters and words with built-in dictionary
Memorize words with flashcards and other modes
Available modes to write words and pick correct letter readings

screenshot.caption: Use SRS (Spaced Repetition System) for efficient memorization
Learn how to write kana and kanji
Built-in dictionary with search by radicals

ul.li: Updated installers for Windows and Linux, now it's not required to have Java installed
Renamed executable for MacOS, please manually delete the old `kanji-dojo` app, tha app name is `Kanji Dojo` now
Fixed a sync issue with incorrectly applied timestamp after downloading data from the cloud
